name: Honokoa Gulch
description:
Introduction

The information on this page is entirely inferred by reading other people's accounts and is not first-hand.

Approach

Descent

R1: multi-stage entrance to the canyon

R3: early in the canyon

Multiple hours of wash hiking and boulder hopping precede the lower gorge

R4: 120' entrance to the lower gorge

R5: 100' in gorge; best rappel of canyon

R6: ~25' final rappel

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

  • CanyonChronicles.com : Honokoa Gulch

Trip reports and media
